Scripting
===================================

The scripting module is no longer experimental. It is now in the main branch. 
The demo/corresponding tests are now in demo/scripting and tests/scripting.

代码弹幕支持
===================================
代码弹幕支持功能已经脱离“实验性”分支，并被纳入了主线研发。有关的demo和测试，在相应的demo，
和tests文件夹里。
